Class Player

com.CMPT276_Group1.project.object.ObjectSuper
com.CMPT276_Group1.project.entity.Entity
com.CMPT276_Group1.project.entity.Player
public class Player extends Entity
Player class that handles the player and all interactions the player has with entities
